about_the_game:
Iris is lost, it all happened in the blink of an eye.

All she knows is that she needs to get back home. Call it a gut feeling.

Maybe you can help her uncover what really occurred...

OVERVIEW

Iris Dissolution is a single-player survival horror game inspired by genre classics. Explore and fight your way out of increasingly surreal environments lurked by horrific creatures.

Featuring fixed camera angles, strategic inventory management, and intricate puzzles; the game delivers a nostalgic experience alongside a touching story of helpless grief.

STORY

After the years she's been working nights, Iris has learned how to silence her regrets. Oddly enough, it was not her shady line of work what made her become yet another victim of the decaying city, but sheer misfortune.

Now, disoriented and desperate, she must find her way back home.

GET BACK HOME

Make your way through eerie, unpredictable locations. Scavenge the scarce resources in the environment, keep moving forward, and never let your guard down. Remember you are always being watched.

Your cellphone may be of use in here. Let's just hope there's service somewhere nearby.

STYLIZED VISUALS

The surreal landscapes of this haunting world come accompanied by hand-crafted textures, stylized character designs, and mesmerizing visual effects, creating an unnervingly beautiful experience.

content_descriptors.notes: Display of weapons, violence against fantasy creatures, blood, themes about death and duel, profanity, swearing.

Recommended:
  • OS: windows 14
  • Processor: a solar panel (environment friendly)
